briefTitle: Clinical Study Comparing Two Models of a Travoprost Intraocular Implant

armGroups.label: Implant Group 1
interventionNames: Combination Product: G2-TR intraocular implant containing travoprost

armGroups.label: Implant Group 2
interventionNames: Combination Product: G2-TR intraocular implant containing travoprost

armGroups.label: Control Group
interventionNames: Drug: Sham surgery + active-comparator eye drops

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Diagnosed with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension
* C/D ratio â‰¤ 0.8
* Zero to two preoperative ocular hypotensive medications

Exclusion Criteria:

* Active corneal inflammation or edema
* Retinal disorders not associated with glaucoma

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Diurnal IOP (as Measured at 8AM and 10AM) Through 3 Months Postoperative
outcomeMeasures.description:
Change from time-matched baseline in IOP at 8AM and 10AM at Day 10, Week 6 and Month 3.

Day 10 8AM IOP minus Baseline 8AM IOP; Day 10 10AM IOP minus Baseline 10AM IOP; Week 6 8AM IOP minus Baseline 8AM IOP; Week 6 10AM IOP minus Baseline 10AM IOP; Month 3 8AM IOP minus Baseline 8AM IOP; Month 3 10AM IOP minus Baseline 10AM IOP.

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean IOP (Control Group vs. Each Implant Group) Through 12 Months Postoperative
outcomeMeasures.description: Difference in mean IOP, between each test group and the control group, for IOP measurements through the Month 12 follow-up visit
